word_mean: 加重物，续加物：增加，增大
重叠在原来已有的物质、状态或条件上的后加物或事
使预先生成并存储的图形、属性特征等被调用并叠合在一个基本图形的过程或方法。

sentence.Network_en: Silver overlay is bonded to the entire surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个表面都镀了一层银。

sentence.Network_en: An overlay of wood covers the brick wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 砖墙上覆盖了一层木板.

sentence.Network_en: There can be an emotional overlay to the frustration of solving real problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 在真正的问题难以解决而感到沮丧的时候，可能会用其他情感来掩饰。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...利于出苗,移植后的植株成活和生长. 计算机词汇中的覆盖(overlay),意为对同一个硬盘区域的数据重写. 覆盖(OverRide) 在面向对象的.
AE中英文对照 ... Lighter Color → 亮色 Overlay → 叠加 Soft Light → 柔光.
重叠(Overlay) ：在目标区域中对应于原始区域被设定的像素均会被设定，其它没有改变。
机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... laser beam welding 雷射光焊接 overlaying 堆焊 propane gas cutting 丙烷气切割.

list.abs: ...plastic Kivar 聚丙烯合成纸（美国Scott Paper产品，商业名称）plastic overlay 塑料贴面plastic pipe 塑料管
信息词汇英语翻译(M-Q) ... overlay 覆盖 overlay file 覆盖文件 overlay load module 覆盖装入程序模块.
在顶层丝印层（top overlay）中使用放置导线工具（place line） ，在焊盘外绘制外形。 为使图形对称， 可精确设置外形的尺寸。
AE中英文对照 ... Satin → 光泽 Color Overlay → 颜色叠加 Gradient Overlay→ 渐变叠加.

encyclopedia.content: 大型活动的临时设施（overlay），其实我们并不陌生。在农村，当某家有婚丧嫁娶等大事时，要请所有的亲朋好友来参加，家里的房屋面积不够，就需要临时搭建大棚或者向左邻右舍借房间，这就是临时建筑；家里的桌椅板凳不够，也需要购置或者外借，这就是家具物资；家里日常用的厨具也不够用，需要临时搭灶，这就是临时餐饮；场地上也需要临时拉个灯泡，这就是临时照明；等等。以上这些综合起来，就是大型活动的临时设施。 概念 临时设

entry.def: If something is overlaid with something else, it is covered by it.

example.ex: The floor was overlaid with rugs of oriental design.
example.tran: 地板上铺着东方风情的地毯。

example.ex: ...woollen cloth, overlaid with gold and silver embroidery.

entry.def: You can use overlay to refer to a substance which covers the surface of something.

example.ex: Silver overlay is bonded to the entire surface.
example.tran: 整个表面都镀了一层银。

example.ex: ...an overlay of snow on the tops of the iron fences.
example.tran: 铁栅栏上落满的一层雪

entry.def: If something is overlaid with a feeling or quality, that feeling or quality is the most noticeable one, but there may be deeper and more important ones involved.

example.ex: The party had been overlaid with a certain nervousness.
example.tran: 这个聚会一直笼罩在不安的气氛中。

example.ex: ...a surge of feeling which at this moment overlaid all others.
example.tran: 此刻突然迸发出来、盖过了其他种种情绪的情感

means.word_mean: 1. protective covering consisting, for example, of a layer of boards applied to the studs and joists of a building to strengthen it and serve as a foundation for a weatherproof exterior
1. put something on top of something else;

sentences.sentence: "cover the meat with a lot of gravy"
